column3: ALERT: SL 287 in Lufkin is open in one northbound lane only. Crews continue to work to open one southbound lane. Be cautious. Reduce speed.
SAN JACINTO COUNTY UPDATE: FM 3278 and FM 1127 are open to traffic. The US 59 boat ramp/Trinity River, FM 2693, FM 3081 remain closed.
UPDATE: FM 3150 in Lufkin is now open to traffic after flooding compromised the roadway at Jack Creek. Drive safely.
ALERT: SL 287 East remains closed in Lufkin. Alternate routes are: SL 287 West, BU 59. From Nacogdoches, SH7 W to US 69 S to SL 287 West.
ALERT: MOTORISTS SHOULD AVOID THE EAST SIDE OF SL 287 IN LUFKIN TO REPAIR DAMAGE TO THE ROADWAY. WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF CLOSING THE ROAD.
ALERT: Motorists should avoid the east side of SL 287 in Lufkin. Contract workers are beginning repairs. AVOID THE AREA.
UPDATE: Shelby County has cleared trees from the roadway overnight and all roadways are open for travel this morning. Drive safely.
UPDATE: Angelina County closures: FM 2497 S; FM 1818 at Biloxi Creek; FM 3150 at Jack Creek TxDOT will begin repairs. #turnarounddontdrown
ALERT: FM 1818 in Angelina County is flooded at Biloxi Creek, Bear Creek and Little Buck Creek. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: FM 353 in San Augustine County, 6 miles east of SH 147 and 2 miles west of SH 87, is closed after a road base failure.
UPDATE: FM 2259, 3 miles from SL 224 in Nacogdoches is open for traffic after being cleared of downed power lines. Drive safely.
ALERT: FM 3150 in Lufkin is closed due to a wash out. It is a crime to drive around barriers. Do not drive through. Too Dangerous.
UPDATE: FM 1818 near Biloxi Creek in Angelina County is clear after fallen trees were cleared from the roadway. Drive safely.
UPDATE: Trees and power lines have been cleared from SH 7 East in Nacogdoches and it is open for traffic. Drive safely.
ALERT: Trees reported down on 1818 near Biloxi Creek in Angelina County. TxDOT crews in route. Monitor closures at http://drivetexas.org.
ALERT: Power lines down across FM 2259, 3 miles from SL 224 in Nacogdoches. TxDOT is monitoring. Power company responding.
UPDATE: FM 95 near Martinsville ISD has been cleared from a fallen tree. Drive safely. Check http://drivetexas.org for closures.
ALERT: FM 3150 in Angelina County is closed due to a wash out due to flooding. TxDOT has barricaded. Do not cross. Choose alternate routes.
ALERT: A fallen tree is blocking both lanes of FM 95 about 4 miles south of Martinsville ISD. TxDOT is in route. Be prepared for delays.
UPDATE: US 59 in Shepherd and in Goodrich where it was previously flooded is now open to traffic. Drive safely. #drivetexas.org.
ALERT: Flooded roads reported in Shelby County: FM 3184 at Blue Creek and FM 139 at Bayou Siepe. #turnarounddontdrown
ALERT: Water over the roadway in various locations in San Augustine County on FM 705, FM 3230 and FM 1279. #turnarounddontdrown
UPDATE: FM 3150 in Angelina County has been repaired and is now open to traffic. Drive safely. #drivetexas.org #turnarounddontdrown
ALERT: Water over the roadway on FM 83 near Pineland. Be cautious and don't drive through flooded areas. #turnarounddontdrown
ALERT: A washout reported on FM 3150 in Angelina County. TxDOT is flagging traffic and beginning repairs. Be cautious and alert.
ALERT: SH 21 at Maddux Creek Bridge at FM 330 and FM 3448 is flooded. Don't drive through flooded roadways. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: FM 83 in Pineland between FM 1 and US 96. Is flooded. For a list of closures/flooded roads, visit http://drivetexas.org.
ALERT: SH 87 South at Sandy Creek near FM 3315 in Sabine County is flooded. Don't drive through flooded roadways. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: Flooding reported on US 69 South of Zavalla near Hubert Cryer Road. One lane only. TxDOT is monitoring. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: Accident reported in SB lane of US 59 near Redland. Drive with caution.
ALERT: FM 2497 South (Ryan's Chapel Road) in Angelina County is under water. TxDOT is monitoring. Don't drive through flooded roadways.
ALERT: San Jacinto County: FM 3081 near FM 1725 and FM 2693 near the Walker County line are closed. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: San Jacinto Road closures: FM 222, 945S, 945N, 2693, 3128W, 150, US 59 at Big Creek and near Liberty County and SL 424 at underpass.
UPDATE: San Jacinto County roads reopened: FM 2666, 2025, 223, 459E, 223 at Coley Creek and SH 150 from Shepherd to the San Jacinto River.
#HARVEY at 4 am this morning.
UPDATE: Water has receded on FM 2497 in Angelina County and is open again for travel. Drive safely.
ALERT: FM 2693/Winters Bayou in San Jacinto County is closed until repairs to the roadway can be made.
This roadway intersects US 59 in Diboll and SH 94 in Hudson. The flooded area is on the south end near Diboll.
ALERT: FM 2497 (Ryan's Chapel Road) in Angelina County is closed due to flooding. TxDOT is monitoring other areas for rising water.
SH 150 at the San Jacinto River is impassable. Remember to turn around and return to safety. Don't drive through.
Lake Livingston Dam release this afternoon.
ALERT: Tree down at the intersection of US287 South and 5th Street in Crockett. Prepare for delays as crews work to clear the roadway.
ALERT: US 87 South at Sandy Creek Bridge in Sabine County has water over the roadway. Motorists should not go through. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: FM 3278 in San Jacinto County and Polk County is closed due to flooding. Barricades are in place. Motorists should not drive through.
ALERT: High water reported on FM 230 at the Houston/Walker county line. FM 357 at Alabama Creek. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: FM 1988 at Long King Creek in Goodrich is closed for flooding. #turnarounddontdrown
ALERT: US 59 South near Shepherd is closed due to flooding. No through traffic is allowed. #TurnAroundDontDrown
Yes, there is flooding on US 59 South near Shepherd. South of there, the flooded areas become more frequent.
ALERT: US 59 at Big Creek in Polk County. Don't attempt to drive through flooded roadways. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: High water reported on FM 230 at CR 3545 in Houston County has water over the roadway. Stay alert to rising water.
There is water over the roadway at Moss Hill and south of Hardin on SH 146. Listed on our real time site http://drivetexas.org
Both Jasper and Jacksonville on US 69 are passable so far this morning. Looking for much more rain so be alert!
ALERT: Flooding on FM 1988 at Long King Creek; FM 942 at Menard Creek; FM 1276 at Big Sandy Creek; and FM 350 in Polk County.
ALERT: Trees reported down on FM 1475 outside of Huntington. TxDOT.crews are in route to clear the roadway.
ALERT: Several trees are reported down in and around Lufkin, including FM 1275, FM 326 and inside the city. TxDOT crews are responding.
ALERT: Trees are reported down on FM 842 in Lufkin. TxDOT crews are responding to clear the roadway. Be cautious. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: Additional flooded roads in Polk County: FM 942 West at Long Tom Creek FM 352 at Dry Creek #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: San Jacinto County flooding: SH 150:@San Jac River;@Winters Bayou;@South Sienna FM 2025@FM 945 FM 2666@Red Road FM 1725@Mill Creek
ALERT: Marie Street in Shepherd is just one street flooded in Polk County. Driving is discouraged.
ALERT: San Jacinto, Polk and Trinity counties are under a Flash Flood warning until 1:30 am Monday. Do not drive through flooded areas.
ALERT: High water on US 59 at the exit road to BU 59 near Livingston in Polk County. Don't drive through running water or flooded roadways.
ALERT: US 59 South at the FM 2914 overpass. Avoid the area. Don't attempt to drive through. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: US 59 at Big Creek, north of Shepherd. Don't attempt to cross. #TurnAroundDontDrown
UPDATE: FM 819/College Drive in Lufkin has been reopened for access to US 59 after closure for evacuee traffic on US 59. Drive safely.
ALERT: Loose gravel on SL 287 East /Medford Dr in Lufkin. Reduce speed. SL 287 West/John Reddit Drive is an alternate route. Drive safely.
ALERT: FM 942 is flooded at Hickman Creek in Polk County. Motorists advised not to drive through flooded roadways. #TurnAroundDontDrown
ALERT: Tree down across 146 near Schwab Road in Polk County. Crew in route to clear it from roadway. Stay alert. Be prepared for delay.
ALERT: US 59 at FM 1988 overpass in Polk County is closed. High water reported in NB lanes of US 59 in San Jacinto County. Stay alert.
ALERT: High water on US 59 at Big Creek and Regency Road in San Jacinto County. #TurnAroundDontDrown
I am not aware of a crash last night. The rock from seal coating loosened after a thunderstorm Friday afternoon. West loop 287 is open.
ALERT: High water reports in San Jacinto County: US 59 S frontage FM 222 @Big Creek SL 424S@US 59S frontage FM 3128W/Rose Hill FM 945N
ALERT: High water closure reported on FM 1988 near Goodrich in Polk County. #TurnAroundDontDrown
UPDATE: Entry onto US 59 at FM 819, south of Lufkin, remains closed to allow for through traffic on US 59.
Be safe guys!
ALERT: High water reported on FM 2610 in Polk County. Visit http://drivetexas.org for real time closures and flooded areas.
ALERT: Deep East Texas will remain under a flood watch and river flood warning for next few days. Stay safe.
ALERT: High water is reported on FM 3126 and FM 356 in Polk County. Stay alert.
ALERT: Ponding is reported on US 59 in San Jacinto County, inside lane 1.5 miles north of FM 2914. TxDOT crews are monitoring. Stay alert.
ALERT: Traffic signals on US 59 at FM 819 in Lufkin will be green to allow for the flow of traffic. Access from FM 819 onto US 59 is closed.
